sn46.21:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn46.21:2.3: “‘Bodhaya samvattanti’ti kho, bhikkhu, tasma bojjhangati vuccanti.
sn46.21:2.5: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
